summary: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.
cast: Tom Neyman|John Reynolds|Diane Adelson|Harold P. Warren|Stephanie Nielson|Sherry Proctor|Robin Redd|Jackey Neyman Jones|Bernie Rosenblum|Joyce Molleur|William Bryan Jennings|Jay Hall|Bettye Birns|Lelanie Hansard|Pat Coburn|Pat Sullivan|George Cavender
title: Manos: The Hands of Fate
